chapter.name: HoaLibrary | Tutorial 2 : Basics
chapter.hoa_block:
Welcome to the HoaLibrary tutorials. This series of tutorials covers all relevant aspects of HoaLibrary and aims at getting you started as quickly as possible. For an overview of all tutorials, see the See Also sections in each Hoa object's help files and references. Be sure to check out the HoaLibrary references besides these tutorials which explains every function of HoaLibrary objects in detail. If you wish to restart a tutorial just close the tutorial patcher and open it by clicking the Open the tutorial link again.
You could also visit our website for more informations.
In this tutorial we will try to provide you an introduction to the basic concept of ambisonics.
